snippet: Giants Coach Tom Coughlin expresses sympathy for Packers coordinator Joe Philbin, whose son died this week.
abstract: Giants Coach Tom Coughlin expresses sympathy for Packers coordinator Joe Philbin, whose son died this week.
lead_paragraph: EAST RUTHERFORD, N.J. -- Giants Coach Tom Coughlin was upbeat and energetic throughout most of his news conference Wednsday, but when a reporter asked about Joe Philbin, the offensive coordinator for theGreen Bay Packers whose 21-year-old son died earlier this week, Couglin's face turned ashen.

headline.main: From Coughlin, Condolences for the Philbin Family
